name: MLObjectDetector.ObjectAnnotation
desc: The label, location, and confidence score of an item the object detector found in an image.

items.name: init(label: String, boundingBox: CGRect, confidence: Double)
items.desc: Creates an annotation for an item an object detector finds in an image.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: The name of the item the object detector found in an image.

items.name: var boundingBox: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangular region that encloses an item the object detector found in the image.

items.name: var confidence: Double
items.desc: The object detector’s confidence score for its prediction’s accuracy.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the object annotation.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the object annotation that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the object annotation within a playground.
